summary: A training script that prepares data loaders with subgraph sampling for the Lander dataset, configures a LANDER graph neural network model using PyTorch and DGL, runs the training loop with optimization, periodically evaluates performance, and saves model checkpoints.
business_intent: To enable researchers to train and assess a graphâ€‘based model for biological or chemical data using subgraph sampling, supporting experiments in computational biology/drug discovery.
